channel.title: [pi] receiving slayerpoints

item.title: [pi] receiving slayerpoints
item.dc:creator: @nerd123456789 ...nerd123456789
item.description:
@nerd123456789 wrote:

Ok so i’ve added a message when you complete the task that it says you receive slayerPoints but it says my total slayerPoints i have not my slayerPoints i have received for that task can someone help me?
the code:
c.sendMessage(“You have received “+ c.slayerPoints +” slayerPoints!”);

Read full topic
